items.short_desc: Find out where to watch the BBL 2020-21 final live on streaming in India, get telecast details, and Sydney Sixers vs Perth Scorchers match time.
items.asset_title: BBL 2020-21 final: Where to watch Sydney Sixers vs Perth Scorchers telecast and live streaming in India

items.short_desc: Sydney Sixers on Saturday thrashed Perth Scorchers by nine wickets in the Qualifier to earn the hosting rights at their home ground (SCG).
items.asset_title: BBL 2020-21: Sydney Cricket Ground to host final on February 6

items.short_desc: The Big Bash League will start on December 10. Get the full BBL 2020 schedule, fixtures, India times, telecast details and where to get live streaming in India.
items.asset_title: Big Bash League 2020: Schedule, fixtures, starting date, times and where to watch streaming in India

items.short_desc: The 10th BBL will begin on December 3 when the Adelaide Strikers host the Melbourne Renegades, followed by 60 matches across the country.
items.asset_title: T20 Big Bash League announces full schedule

items.short_desc: The Aussie all-rounder got his hands on several records in his match-winning knock against Sydney Sixers in the Big Bash League.
items.asset_title: Marcus Stoinis scripts history in Big Bash League

items.short_desc: SportsAdda's brand ambassador Brett Lee picks four players who he thinks could be the standout performers on Saturday’s Big Bash League finale.
items.asset_title: Brett’s watch list: Players to watch during Big Bash League final

items.short_desc: After a tantalizing opening week of cricket action, we bring you the top fantasy picks for the second week of the Big Bash League 2020-21 season.
items.asset_title: Fantasy Focus: Top Picks for BBL 2020-21 second week

items.short_desc: With the highly-anticipated Big Bash League 2020-21 season all set to begin, we bring you the top fantasy picks who could be the game-changers in the opening week.
items.asset_title: Fantasy Focus: Top picks for BBL 2020-21 opening week

items.short_desc: While the Big Bash League's new rules may seem outlandish, it is important to see them play out rather than having an inherent prejudice against them.
items.asset_title: Big Bash League new rules: Why we should not dread the changes

items.short_desc: While the Sydney Sixers vs Perth Scorchers head-to-head record favours Ashton Turner’s side, a closer statistical look shows it won't be that simple.
items.asset_title: BBL Final Adda Notes: Numbers that keep you ahead in Sixers vs Scorchers clash

items.short_desc: Know what you can expect from the eighth week of the Big Bash League (BBL) 2020-21 season.
items.asset_title: BBL Adda Notes: Numbers that keep you ahead in week 8

items.short_desc: Know what you can expect from the sixth week of the Big Bash League (BBL) 2020-21 season.
items.asset_title: BBL Adda Notes: Numbers that keep you ahead in week 6

items.short_desc: It has been a season of many firsts for the Stars and we take a look at some of the players who played an important role in their success.
items.asset_title: A look at the architects of Melbourne Stars' road to their maiden WBBL final

items.short_desc: The league's standards continue to plummet with their tendency to introduce gimmicks under the pretext of innovations.
items.asset_title: Are the new Big Bash League rules good for the game?

items.short_desc: Glenn Maxwell has been in stunning form for Melbourne Stars in the Big Bash League, and he is expected to be a big miss for the India tour.
items.asset_title: Will Australia miss in-form Glenn Maxwell against India?
